summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 774 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 1.7°C), and light levels (up 2625 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 723.7m higher than yesterday, 174.5m lower than the past week, 774.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 1989.4m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. A few light raindrops may fall, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
